Measuring production costs

to reflect, how easier (and more cost-effective) the life is for the projects

past

Costs and savings

  • Component is made only once 👍🏻
  • Component needs to be integrated 👎🏻
  • Component needs to be supported 👎🏻
  • We support only one component 👍🏻

Costs formula

To make it once (in Design System)

$ = production time
    + (support costs * component lifetime)
    + (integration time * amount of projects)

To make it many times

$ = (
    production time + (support costs * component lifetime)
  ) * amount of projects

Costs formula, whole system

Cost savings: 752 hours = 18.8 weeks = 4 months

How to get the data?

  • Survey
  • Figma statistics / API
  • GitHub Search / API
  • Code analyzers
